overview: Imagine what it's like walking into a room filled with beautiful girls, who are waiting and willing to do anything you want... for a price. Imagine seeing Sunset Thomas walk right up to you and say, "Welcome to the Pleasure Ranch. I'm here to turn you on and get you off." Well stop dreaming and start playing. With Virtual Pleasure Ranch, you get to join our cast of characters and experience first-hand what a night at the world famous Pleasure Ranch is all about.  Filled with glamorous trysts, downright nasty threesomes, a blow job lounge, peep show and a labyrinth of tawdry and steamy massage parlors, the Pleasure Ranch has something for everyone. And no matter what it takes to get you off, your secret is safe... just ask Sunset Thomas.
title: Virtual Pleasure Ranch
